biotools.summary: A software package for prediction of alternative isoforms of protein-coding genes, based on both genomic DNA evidence and aligned RNA-seq reads.  The method is based on the use of ORF graphs, which are more general than the splice graphs used in traditional transcript assembly.

bioschemas.name: RSVP
bioschemas.summary: A software package for prediction of alternative isoforms of protein-coding genes, based on both genomic DNA evidence and aligned RNA-seq reads.  The method is based on the use of ORF graphs, which are more general than the splice graphs used in traditional transcript assembly.
